sentences.sContent: All the furniture was covered in dust .
sentences.sCn: 所有的家具都蒙上了灰尘。

sentences.sContent: There’s not a speck of dust in the kitchen.
Dust particles floated in the sunlight.
sentences.sCn: 阳光里飘浮着尘埃颗粒。

sentences.sContent: A sudden breeze sent motes of dust (= small bits of dust ) dancing in the air.
sentences.sCn: 突然刮起一阵微风吹得灰尘飞扬。

sentences.sContent: The wind was blowing dust and leaves up from the ground.
sentences.sCn: 风吹起了地上的尘土和树叶。

phrases.pCn: 防尘；尘埃控制；飞尘捕集
粉尘排放，烟尘排放；[机]扬尘量
n. 烟灰；烟道灰；炉顶灰
尘土和炉灰；令人失望的事物

words.tran: 抹布，掸子；除尘器；打扫灰尘的人

trans.tranOther: dry powder consisting of extremely small bits of dirt that is in buildings on furniture, floors etc if they are not kept clean
